title: The Big Two? This Alcaraz-Sinner rivalry is epic
description: Sinner and Alcaraz have combined to win the last six Grand Slams -- and are pushing each other to new heights in the sport.
author: D'Arcy Maine

title: Swiatek, Pegula advance to Bad Homburg semis
description: Fourth seed Iga Swiatek earned a 6-4 7-6(5) victory over Russia's Ekaterina Alexandrova and reached the Bad Homburg Open semifinals on Thursday.
author: Reuters

title: GB No 33 Tarvet reaches Wimbledon - why will he not get full prize money?
description: Britain's Oliver Tarvet reaches the Wimbledon singles main draw - which will contain the highest number of home players for 41 years.

title: Evans 'put name back out there' as Eastbourne run ends
description: Britain's Dan Evans believes he has "put his name back out there" as his run at Eastbourne ends with defeat in the quarter-finals.

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let’s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: What were the key Wimbledon qualifying results?
description: Wimbledon qualifying concluded with a busy day of action on Thursday, when a host of players earned a main-draw spot at the grass-court major. Chris Rodesch upset top seed Marton Fucsovics, a two-time ATP Tour champion, 6-3, 6-4, 0-6, 7-6(4). Giulio Zeppieri defeated 2022 quarter-finalist Cristian Garin 1-6, 6-2, 6-4, 5-7, 7-5. Former Top 20 star Adrian Mannarino beat Li Tu 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4, while Nicolas Jarry defeated Lukas Klein 6-4, 6-2, 6-4. Nikoloz Basilashvili eliminated Juan Pablo Ficovich 1-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-1 and Frenchman Arthur Cazaux dispatched Dusan Lajovic 6-7(4), 6-2, 6-3, 6-4. View all Thursday qualifying results from London below or click here to catch up on scores from all of the day's matches. Results - Thursday, QR3 Chris Rodesch (LUX) def. [1] Marton Fucsovics (HUN) 6-3, 6-4, 0-6, 7-6(4) James McCabe (AUS) def. [5] Tomas Barrios Vera (CZE) 4-6, 6-3, 7-6(5), 7-6(7) [6] Valentin Royer (FRA) def. Titouan Droguet (FRA) 6-3, 6-4, 6-2 [7] Arthur Cazaux (FRA) def. [26] Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 6-7(4), 6-2, 6-3, 6-4 Giulio Zeppieri (ITA) def. [8] Cristian Garin (CHI) 1-6, 6-2, 6-4, 5-7, 7-5 [16] Nikoloz Basilashvili (GEO) def. Juan Pablo Ficovich (ARG) 1-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-1 [18] Adrian Mannarino (FRA) def. Li Tu (AUS) 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4 [WC] Oliver Tarvet (GBR) def. Alexander Blockx (BEL) 6-3, 3-6, 6-2, 6-1 [30] Filip Misolic (AUT) def. Benjamin Hassan (LEB) 2-6, 7-6(6), 7-6(5), 6-3 [32] Nicolas Jarry (CHI) def. Lukas Klein (SVK) 6-4, 6-2, 6-4 Alex Bolt (AUS) def. Martin Landaluce (ESP) 6-1, 6-2, 6-4 August Holmgren (DEN) def. Yosuke Watanuki (JPN) 6-4, 6-7(2), 3-6, 7-6(11), 7-6(7) Shintaro Mochizuki (JPN) def. Dominic Stricker (SUI) 7-6(3), 3-6, 6-2, 6-4 Leandro Riedi (SUI) def. [WC] Hamish Stewart (GBR) 6-3, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4 Beibit Zhukayev (KAZ) def. Luka Pavlovic (FRA) 3-6, 6-3, 6-2, 7-6(5) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: Poll: Who will win Wimbledon 2025?
description: Wimbledon is just a few days away, set to begin Monday. Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz, No. 1 in PIF ATP Rankings Jannik Sinner, seven-time champion Novak Djokovic and plenty of other stars will headline action at the grass-court major. Who do you think will be the champion this year? Make your choice below in atptour.com's Wimbledon poll. [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: Alcaraz Saves 3 Championships Points to Defend Roland Garros Title
description: Carlos Alcaraz clinched his fifth Grand Slam title in a thrilling five-set battle against Jannik Sinner at Roland Garros on Sunday, rallying from two sets down to win 4-6, 6-7(4), 6-4, 7-6(3), 7-6(10-2). The match, the longest Roland Garros final ever at 5 hours and 29 minutes, saw Alcaraz save three championship points in the …
author: Jonathan

title: French Open 2025 Semi Final Recap
description: Day Thirteen at Roland Garros delivered two very different semi-finals, but one clear outcome: the dream final is on. Carlos Alcaraz was the first to book his spot, recovering from a slow start to take control against Lorenzo Musetti, who was forced to retire early in the fourth set due to a leg injury. The …
author: Jonathan
